roleset.name: to dwell on
roleset.note: HARP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'harp' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from harp.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: entity who just can't let it go
listener, who is arg0 harping to?

example.name: transitive
example.text: And I think [0] a lot of people will harp on program trading .

example.name: With Arg 2
example.text: [The defense lawyer]-1 still continued *-1 to harp incessantly to the judge on this issue...
